trigger.description: This trigger need to be manually closed.

trigger.description: This trigger need to be manually closed.

item_prototype.name: {#MACHINE_UPPER} Collapse [{#VOL}] Age
item_prototype.params: now("wmi.get[root\cimv2,SELECT TimeGenerated FROM Win32_NTLogEvent WHERE (logfile='Application') AND (SourceName='StorageCraft ImageManager') AND (EventCode=1120) AND (Message LIKE '%\\{#SITECODE}%\\{#MACHINE}%\\{#VOL}%.spi')]")-last("wmi.get[root\cimv2,SELECT TimeGenerated FROM Win32_NTLogEvent WHERE (logfile='Application') AND (SourceName='StorageCraft ImageManager') AND (EventCode=1120) AND (Message LIKE '%\\{#SITECODE}%\\{#MACHINE}%\\{#VOL}%.spi')]")

trigger_prototype.name: No ImageManager Collapse of {#MACHINE_UPPER} [{#VOL}] for more than 36h

dependency.name: No ImageManager Collapse of {#MACHINE_UPPER} [{#VOL}] for more than 72h

trigger_prototype.name: No ImageManager Collapse of {#MACHINE_UPPER} [{#VOL}] for more than 72h

item_prototype.name: {#MACHINE_UPPER} Collapse [{#VOL}] Success
item_prototype.key: wmi.get[root\cimv2,SELECT TimeGenerated FROM Win32_NTLogEvent WHERE (logfile='Application') AND (SourceName='StorageCraft ImageManager') AND (EventCode=1120) AND (Message LIKE '%\\{#SITECODE}%\\{#MACHINE}%\\{#VOL}%.spi')]

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:eventlog[Application,,,StorageCraft ImageManager,,,skip].regexp(\\{#SITECODE}\\{#MACHINE}\\,#1)}=1 and ({Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:eventlog[Application,,,StorageCraft ImageManager,,,skip].regexp({#VOL}-.+\.spi,#1)}=1 or {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:eventlog[Application,,,StorageCraft ImageManager,,,skip].regexp(_VOL-b\d+-.+\.spi,#1)}=0) and {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:imagemanager.collapse.age[{#MACHINE},{#VOL}].last()}>0 and {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:eventlog[Application,,,StorageCraft ImageManager,,,skip].logseverity()}=9
trigger_prototype.name: Critical Error in ImageManager Event Log for {#MACHINE_UPPER} [{#VOL}]

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:eventlog[Application,,,StorageCraft ImageManager,,,skip].regexp(\\{#SITECODE}\\{#MACHINE}\\,#1)}=1 and ({Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:eventlog[Application,,,StorageCraft ImageManager,,,skip].regexp({#VOL}-.+\.spi,#1)}=1 or {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:eventlog[Application,,,StorageCraft ImageManager,,,skip].regexp(_VOL-b\d+-.+\.spi,#1)}=0) and {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:imagemanager.collapse.age[{#MACHINE},{#VOL}].last()}>0 and {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:eventlog[Application,,,StorageCraft ImageManager,,,skip].logseverity()}=4
trigger_prototype.name: Error in ImageManager Event Log for {#MACHINE_UPPER} [{#VOL}]

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:eventlog[Application,,,StorageCraft ImageManager,,,skip].regexp(\\{#SITECODE}\\{#MACHINE}\\,#1)}=1 and ({Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:eventlog[Application,,,StorageCraft ImageManager,,,skip].regexp({#VOL}-.+\.spi,#1)}=1 or {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:eventlog[Application,,,StorageCraft ImageManager,,,skip].regexp(_VOL-b\d+-.+\.spi,#1)}=0) and {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:imagemanager.collapse.age[{#MACHINE},{#VOL}].last()}>0 and {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:eventlog[Application,,,StorageCraft ImageManager,,,skip].logseverity()}=1
trigger_prototype.name: Information in ImageManager Event Log for {#MACHINE_UPPER} [{#VOL}]

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:eventlog[Application,,,StorageCraft ImageManager,,,skip].regexp(\\{#SITECODE}\\{#MACHINE}\\,#1)}=1 and ({Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:eventlog[Application,,,StorageCraft ImageManager,,,skip].regexp({#VOL}-.+\.spi,#1)}=1 or {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:eventlog[Application,,,StorageCraft ImageManager,,,skip].regexp(_VOL-b\d+-.+\.spi,#1)}=0) and {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:imagemanager.collapse.age[{#MACHINE},{#VOL}].last()}>0 and {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:eventlog[Application,,,StorageCraft ImageManager,,,skip].logseverity()}=2
trigger_prototype.name: Warning in ImageManager Event Log for {#MACHINE_UPPER} [{#VOL}]

item_prototype.name: {#MACHINE_UPPER} Backup [{#TASK}] Age
item_prototype.params: now("wmi.get[root\cimv2,SELECT TimeGenerated FROM Win32_NTLogEvent WHERE (logfile='Application') AND (SourceName='ShadowProtectSPX') AND (EventCode=3) AND (Message LIKE '%Backup \"{#TASK}\" on {#MACHINE} successfully finished backing up%')]")-last("wmi.get[root\cimv2,SELECT TimeGenerated FROM Win32_NTLogEvent WHERE (logfile='Application') AND (SourceName='ShadowProtectSPX') AND (EventCode=3) AND (Message LIKE '%Backup \"{#TASK}\" on {#MACHINE} successfully finished backing up%')]")

trigger_prototype.name: No ShadowProtectSPX Backup of {#MACHINE_UPPER} [{#TASK}] for more than 36h

dependency.name: No ShadowProtectSPX Backup of {#MACHINE_UPPER} [{#TASK}] for more than 72h

trigger_prototype.name: No ShadowProtectSPX Backup of {#MACHINE_UPPER} [{#TASK}] for more than 72h

item_prototype.name: {#MACHINE_UPPER} Backup [{#TASK}] Success
item_prototype.key: wmi.get[root\cimv2,SELECT TimeGenerated FROM Win32_NTLogEvent WHERE (logfile='Application') AND (SourceName='ShadowProtectSPX') AND (EventCode=3) AND (Message LIKE '%Backup "{#TASK}" on {#MACHINE} successfully finished backing up%')]

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:eventlog[Application,,,ShadowProtectSPX,,,skip].regexp(Backup \"{#TASK}\" on {#MACHINE},#1)}=1 and {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:shadowprotectspx.backup.age[{#MACHINE},{#TASK}].last()}>0 and {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:eventlog[Application,,,ShadowProtectSPX,,,skip].logseverity()}=9
trigger_prototype.name: Critical Error in ShadowProtectSPX Event Log for {#MACHINE_UPPER} [{#TASK}]

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:eventlog[Application,,,ShadowProtectSPX,,,skip].regexp(Backup \"{#TASK}\" on {#MACHINE},#1)}=1 and {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:shadowprotectspx.backup.age[{#MACHINE},{#TASK}].last()}>0 and {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:eventlog[Application,,,ShadowProtectSPX,,,skip].logseverity()}=4
trigger_prototype.name: Error in ShadowProtectSPX Event Log for {#MACHINE_UPPER} [{#TASK}]

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:eventlog[Application,,,ShadowProtectSPX,,,skip].regexp(Backup \"{#TASK}\" on {#MACHINE},#1)}=1 and {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:shadowprotectspx.backup.age[{#MACHINE},{#TASK}].last()}>0 and {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:eventlog[Application,,,ShadowProtectSPX,,,skip].logseverity()}=1
trigger_prototype.name: Information in ShadowProtectSPX Event Log for {#MACHINE_UPPER} [{#TASK}]

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:eventlog[Application,,,ShadowProtectSPX,,,skip].regexp(Backup \"{#TASK}\" on {#MACHINE},#1)}=1 and {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:shadowprotectspx.backup.age[{#MACHINE},{#TASK}].last()}>0 and {Template Futur-Tech App StorageCraft:eventlog[Application,,,ShadowProtectSPX,,,skip].logseverity()}=2
trigger_prototype.name: Warning in ShadowProtectSPX Event Log for {#MACHINE_UPPER} [{#TASK}]

step.params: Backup "([^"]+)" on (.+) successfully finished backing up \0
